frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopupDescrip.message: Det √§r inte som att jag inte vill att du ska donera f√∂r att st√∂dja Talkie och √∂ppen k√§llkod i allm√§mhet ‚Äî jag vill bara inte att du ska bli irriterad n√§r du anv√§nder Talkie till att b√∂rja med. Om du inakiverar donationsknapparna i bubblan, hoppas jag att du √§ven st√∂djer Talkie p√• n√•got s√§tt! Knapparna kommer alltid vara tillg√§ngliga h√§r bland alternativen, utifall att.
frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopupDescrip.original: It's not like I don't want you to get Talkie üåü Premium or donate to support Talkie and open source development in general ‚Äî I just don't want you to be annoyed when using Talkie in the first place. If you disable the donation buttons in the popup, I hope that you will also support Talkie in some way! The buttons will always be available here among the options, just in case.
frontend_hideDonateButtonsInPopupDescrip.translated-from: It's not like I don't want you to get Talkie üåü Premium or donate to support Talkie and open source development in general ‚Äî I just don't want you to be annoyed when using Talkie in the first place. If you disable the donation buttons in the popup, I hope that you will also support Talkie in some way! The buttons will always be available here among the options, just in case.

frontend_licenseCLADescription.message: Alla bidrag till Talkie g√∂rs med tillst√•nd av Contributor License Agreement (CLA).

frontend_licenseCLADescription.translated-from: All contributions to Talkie are made under the Contributor License Agreement (CLA).

frontend_storyDescription.message: Talkie utvecklades ett par dagar f√∂re ny√•r 2016-2017, p√• utmaning av en kompis. Utmaningen b√∂rjade med fr√•gan: under pendlingen till jobbet, √§r det m√∂jligt att lyssna p√• en artikel ist√§llet f√∂r att l√§sa den? L√§tt som en pl√§tt, sa jag, och satte ig√•ng med att bevisa det ‚Äî eller i alla fall att f√• min webbl√§sare att l√§sa upp text med en knasig r√∂st. Den grundl√§ggande versionen, utan n√•got anv√§ndargr√§nssnitt, visade sig vara trivial att skapa. Att l√§gga till ett anv√§ndargr√§nssnitt tog l√§ngre tid. Att l√§gga till ordentlig spr√•kdetektering kr√§vde en dr√∂s mer kod. Att bem√§stra buggar i webbl√§saren √§nnu mer jobb. Listan p√• f√∂rb√§ttringar och nyttigheter v√§xer ‚Äî och ett par tusen rader kod senare, ser du resultatet.
frontend_storyDescription.original: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it ‚Äî or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic version, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on ‚Äî and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.
frontend_storyDescription.translated-from: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it ‚Äî or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic version, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on ‚Äî and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.
